name: Gods and Towers
description:
This game was released during the Ludum Dare #49 (game jam).

The theme was "Unstable " so we created a Tricky Tower Like game where gods have patiently wait for humanity to disappear.

Then they proceed to play to create the biggest tower ever with cars, trains, houses etc... The physics is the principal element of gameplay and the game is a multiplayer couch game.

 So get on your keyboard and pass to the action !! 

Create the BIGGEST TOWER EVER IN... GODS AND TOWER : THE GAME !!!

— Game —

Gods And Tower is a little local multiplayer physics based game where gods play gods by building huge tower with humanity leftovers.

It's kinda hard, don't be scare to hit the reset button.

— Controls —

Player 1 WASD to move the pieces E to clear your platform

Player 2 Arrows to move the pieces 0 on the numpad to clear your platform
